tswitem.name: Signet of Renewed Vigil
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Renewed Vigil
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever your barrier effects expire for any reason, you gain a beneficial effect which increases the strength of the next barrier you apply by 5%/10%/15%. This Signet can be attached to Major Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
